name: ENCAGED (Hydrodinamic Studios)
description:
A small puzzles game with mechanics based in the bi-colored theme of the B&W Jam (Hosted by Lone Rabbit) in which this game was made. Themed in a devastated near future, where the narrator reflects about the society and human nature with psychedelic ascii art animations.

Any suggestions / comments / critics are always welcome!!

As this game was made for a jam, you may find some minor bugs. If you do so, dont doubt on commenting.
